full_summary:
===============

## Tender Opportunity - Simultaneous Thermogravimetric Analyzer and Differential Scanning Calorimeter

### Tender Information

*   **Tender Title:** 31019-223118, Simultaneous Thermogravimetric Analyzer and Differential Scanning Calorimeter
*   **Solicitation Number:** WS3796503514
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 13 January 2023, 14:00:00

### Contracting Entity

*   **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

### End User

*   **End User Entity Name:** National Research Council of Canada (NRC)
*   **End User Entity Address:** 100 Sussex Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0R6, Canada

### Technical Description

*   We are seeking proposals for the acquisition of a Simultaneous Thermogravimetric Analyzer (TGA) and Differential Scanning Calorimeter (DSC) system for the National Research Council of Canada (NRC).

### Tender Evaluation

*   **Evaluation Method:** Lowest Price

### Notice Details

*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
*   **Notice URL:** http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14943190?extsite=MTQ5NDMxOTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
*   **Tender Description:** The TGA and DSC system shall have the capability to perform both simultaneous TGA and DSC measurements.

### Trade Agreements

*   This tender opportunity is open to all qualified suppliers willing to comply with the specified trade agreements, which include:

        *   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
        *   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
        *   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
        *   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
        *   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
        *   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

### Contact Information

*   **Contact Name:** Adrianne Dunsmore, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Contact Email:** adrianne.dunsmore@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
